title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: Go Modules 包管理简介
content:
Go 从 1.11 开始引入 Go Modules 管理包依赖。
常用命令go mod init your-module-namego get github.com/gin-gonic/gingo build



title: liunx/commanddate: 2025-06-28 11:18:16tags:

title: Python Package 管理简介
content:
Python 的包管理通常使用 pip，配合 PyPI（Python Package Index）进行安装、升级和卸载包。
常用命令pip install requestspip listpip uninstall numpy
